name: A2 Poster: Thrash Hits presents... The Ghost of a Thousand @ Old Blue Last - 07/01/11
description:
We are dead proud to announce that the inaugural (and probably last ever) Thrash Hits presents… gig will feature a headline set from The Ghost of a Thousand! Support comes from mighty West Country tyrants, Turbowolf and plucky Welshmen, Bastions but there’s definitely going to be one more. Ooh, the suspense.

This poster was designed by Tom Lacey, singer of The Ghost of a Thousand.

http://www.wegottickets.com/event/96933

name: "Set of" 3 Thrash Hits badges
description:
Yeah, we got a bag of badges with the Thrash Hits logo on them. Give us a quid and we'll send you THREE (3).

We'll throw in a discarded promo CD as well. You might get Evile, but you might get The Blackout. It's (un)lucky dip.
